Posts.Content: Tell me more about acturials....I'm a nurse and haven't heard of this practice.  I am also a double cancer survivor.  Ovarian and kidney.  I want to understand what it is to alkaline my body and why this would be advantageous to avoid cancer or rid one's body of the disease.  Are you a scientist?  A doctor?  A drug salesman?
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Tell me more about acturials....I'm a nurse and haven't heard of this practice.  I am also a double cancer survivor.  Ovarian and kidney.  I want to understand what it is to alkaline my body and why this would be advantageous to avoid cancer or rid one's body of the disease.  Are you a scientist?  A doctor?  A drug salesman?
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I tend to agree with you regarding Dave's tactics.  Currently most of us who have had cancer are scared and are reaching out to others who are experiencing the same things.  It helps me to read what others have gone through and vent my story.  I believe that my oncologist has my best interests in her heart.  She recommends treatment that has been studied and proven beneficial.   So far so good.  I also recently had genetic testing completed.   I should hear the results in a week or two as to BRCA1 and 2, as well as a few other genetic diseases common with ovarian and kidney cancers.  This was recommended by my oncologist.   It is a personal decision as to whether to have this testing done.  It will give me more information about my genes....
Posts.Title: SCARED
